title: Little Witch Academia
resume: When she was a little girl, Atsuko "Akko" Kagari saw a magic show performed by a witch named Shiny Chariot.  From that day on she wanted to be just like her.  Enrolling at Luna Nova Magical Academy and having no magical background, can she become a witch like her idol Shiny Chariot?
